emuInput.TitMainTitle: Two children walking in front of the homes of Rev. A.M. Waller and Reginald H. Cordice, Foster Road, North Versailles
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 22, 1955, pg. 5 reads: "Homes Of Negroes - On the left is the home of the Rev. A. M .Waller while Reginald H. Cordice's home is adjacent. The Saturday night disturbance which resulted in a 13-year-old white boy being hospitalized with four shotgun pellets in his body happened on the side of Cordice's home.- Harris Photo."
